Title: Will Work for Milo
Plot: A homeless man decides to bully Milo to the point of no return. Neal is convinced that he needs to make a relationship power grab, and Amy isn't having any of it. Gibbs takes on a new, more respected position after finding an old pair of glasses. Tyler fakes a job in order to pick up a new customer.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Meredith Hagner, Seth Green, Cherilyn Wilson, Cedric Yarbrough, Jonathan Coleman, Gina Jackson, Igor Torgeson
